title: 怎么对玩家说：你的计分板分数为？
txt_content:
如题
计分板名为gg
版本：1.7.10

replies.author: xmdhs

replies.txt_content:
SPGoding 发表于 2019-8-13 12:46
/tellraw @a ["你的分数为",{"score":{"name":"*","objective":"gg"}}]
无效的json

FHC红石 发表于 2019-8-13 12:47
/tellraw @a {"text":"你的分数为","extra":[{"score":{"name":"*","objective":"walk"}}]}
还是无效
吃饭去了

replies.author: 爱心魔王FHC
replies.txt_content:
SPGoding 发表于 2019-8-13 12:46
/tellraw @a ["你的分数为",{"score":{"name":"*","objective":"gg"}}]
大概就是没有吧




image.png (126.92 KB, 下载次数: 0)

下载附件

2019-8-13 13:33 上传

replies.author: 樱丶天空
replies.txt_content:
/tellraw <选择器> [{"text":"你的分数为"},{"score":{"name":"<选择器>","objective":"<积分项>"}]
"<>"内容为填的东西的类型。

replies.author: TNTcraftHIM
replies.txt_content: /tellraw @p [{"text":"你的计分板分数为：","color":"green","bold":false,"italic":false,"underlined":false,"strikethrough":false,"obfuscated":false},{"score":{"objective":"gg","name":"在这里输入玩家的名字"},"color":"dark_aqua","bold":true,"italic":false,"underlined":false,"strikethrough":false,"obfuscated":false}]

replies.author: 深绿世界X
replies.txt_content: 换新版本。。。1.7的指令不完善

replies.author: t1546542
replies.txt_content: /tellraw @a [{"text":"你的计分板分数为:"},{"score":{"name":"*","objective":"gg"}}]复制代码
这没办法，这只能一个一个提示了（就是1,2,3,4,5,6,7.....每个都用一个命令方块），然后检测分数为几就激活对应的命令方块
